dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni and I made our way to the place she said there was evil afoot. According to her there was a teacher causing trouble to people and that he must be some kind of demon.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Considering Lucci is a part of this school it wouldnâ€™t surprise me.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I muttered to myself as we peered into the room.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni pointed towards Mr. Watanabe! Wait I mean he is a bad person, but there is no way he is a demon...Is he?
